description: Bit-interleaved number addition table; like binary addition but carries shift 2 instead of 1; addition base sqrt(2).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Antidiagonals n=0..125 of square array, flattened
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Bits (xor, (.&.), shift)a054240 :: Integer -> Integer -> Integera054240 x 0 = xa054240 x y = a054240 (x `xor` y) (shift (x .&. y) 2)a054240_adiag n =  map (\k -> a054240 (n - k) k) [0..n]a054240_square = map a054240_adiag [0..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 03 2011
